name: Spacecave Man - Small demo
description:
In this game you play as Zora, a lost warrior , crashed on an isolated and dangerous planet filled with monsters.

Your objectives are to survive the adventure, kill monsters  for points and find your way back home.

Right now its only a demo with one short level, I hope you enjoy!

Thanks @ansimuz for his brilliant assets of the game. 
You can download it from unity store or from here:
https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-caves
